prompt:
Describe some of the most beautiful beaches in the world that you have visited or would like to visit. Please explain why they are so attractive to you.
I am very fond of beaches and love spending time near them. I would love to hear about your experiences with breathtaking beaches around the world - whether it is their white sand, crystal clear waters, vibrant sunsets or unique wildlife that attracts you! Please share any personal stories related to these beaches if possible.
